flawed_nl_solution:
In the first hour, the balloon will increase in volume by 2/5 of 500cm³ which is (2/5)*500cm³ = <<2/5*500=2500/2>>2500/2cm³
After the first hour, it will have a volume of (500+2500/2)cm³ = <<(500+2500/2)=1750>>1750cm³
In the second hour, it will increase in volume by 2/5 of 1750cm³ which is (2/5)*1750cm³ = <<2/5*1750=700>>700cm³
After the second hour, it's volume will be (1750+700)cm³ = <<(1750+700)=2450>>2450cm³
#### 2450

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2500/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
